title: 刷狗的条件是啥
txt_content: 我要造歌人工的刷狗点

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
Wolves will spawn in all difficulty levels (including peaceful), and only in Forest, Pine Forest, and Taiga biomes. 

On Grass, in Forest and Taiga biomes

狼會在所有難度等級的森林或針葉林生態區的草地上生成

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
不可能造人造刷狼点

完全随机的 你可以造刷动物塔 因为狗也是动物
